original_text: And as for you, if you will walk before me as David your father walked, doing according to all that I have commanded you and keeping my statutes and my rules,
korean_text: 네가 만일 내 앞에서 행하기를 네 아버지 다윗이 행한 것과 같이 하여 내가 네게 명령한 모든 것을 행하여 내 율례와 법규를 지키면

sentences.original_text: if you will walk before me

sentences.korean_translation: 네 아버지 다윗이 행한 것 같이,

sentences.original_text: doing according to all that I have commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 명한 모든 것을 행하며,

sentences.original_text: and keeping my statutes and my rules,
